contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Paris metro |Pic=[[File:Metro - Paris - Ligne 5 - station Bobigny - Pablo Picasso 02.jpg|275px]] |Name=Bobigny — Pablo Picasso |Subtitle=Préfecture — Hôtel du Département |Day=25 April |Year=1985 |Access=Rue Pablo Picasso × Boul. Maurice Thorez<br>Trésorerie Générale de la Seine–Saint-Denis<br>Gare Routière Bobigny — Pablo Picasso (five) |Municipality=Bobigny |Zone=1 |Next= {{Paris Metro/next special|5|[[Bobigny - Pantin - Raymond Queneau (Paris Métro)|Bobigny — Pantin<br>Raymond Queneau]]|Terminus}} | X=300 | Y=200 }} '''Bobigny – Pablo Picasso (Préfecture - Hôtel du Département)''' is a [[metro station|station]] of the [[Paris Métro]], the eastern terminus of [[Paris Métro Line 5|Line 5]] and a stop on [[Paris Tramway Line 1|Tramway Line 1]]. The name refers to the commune of Bobigny and to the rue Pablo Picasso, named after the Spanish modern artist [[Pablo Picasso]]. ==Gallery== <gallery widths="200px" heights="125px" perrow="2"> File:Metro - Paris - Ligne 5 - station Bobigny - Pablo Picasso 01.jpg|[[Paris Métro Line 5|Line 5]] platforms at Bobigny – Pablo Picasso File:Metro - Paris - Ligne 5 - station Bobigny - Pablo Picasso 03.jpg|Artwork at Bobigny – Pablo Picasso File:T1 a bobigny pablo picasso.jpg|[[Paris Tramway Line 1|T1 tram]] at Bobigny – Pablo Picasso File:Bobigny - T1 station Pablo-Picasso 03.jpg|T1 tram at Bobigny – Pablo Picasso </gallery> [[File:Bobigny - Pablo-Picasso - Gare routiere 01.jpg|450px|thumb|left|Bobigny bus station]] {{commons category|Bobigny - Pablo Picasso (Paris Metro)}} ==References== *Roland, Gérard (2003). ''Stations de métro. D’Abbesses à Wagram.'' Éditions Bonneton. {{Paris Metro/line 5}} {{coord|48.907|N|2.433|E|display=title|source:nlwiki}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Bobigny - Pablo Picasso}} [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1985]] {{Paris-metro-stub}}
